enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Another achievement was the decision on non-Annex I Communications.

A decision to create a consultative group of experts, consisting of members predominately from non- Annex I Parties, will reduce some developing countries' anxieties that data will be used to press for target setting and ranking of performance, resulting in an imposition of new conditionalities for access to GEF funding.
